article_title: Some Kansas lawmakers hope for a session short in length and short on wrangling
article_text:
But fights over school funding, budgets and tax policy are taking shape

Many want to avoid a repeat of last year’s contentious, lengthy session

article_metadata.news-keywords: Kansas Legislature, 2016 Kansas Legislature session, Gov. Sam Brownback, Senate President Susan Wagle, House Minority Leader Tom Burroughs, Rep. Melissa Rooker
article_metadata.description: Although many Kansas legislators want to avoid having another uproarious session in an election year, fights on budgets, taxes and Medicaid, among other issues, appear to be on the horizon in Topeka.
article_metadata.title: Some Kansas lawmakers hope for a session short in length and short on wrangling | The Kansas City Star
